name: The Game's Afoot!
description:
When the Hunters, become the Hunted!

A normal gig soon transforms to a fight for your life!

Gather information at Moonies! Investigate Jolly Molly's Malt Shop! Hunt down the Vampire for the enigmatic General and the cash reward in this Dustbowl Adventure!

This gig is meant to be played in tandem with iHunt zine #15!: https://machineage.itch.io/ihunt-the-rpg-zine-15-hunting-in-the-dust-ihunt-in-th...
